name: Whatsapp Web - Fullscreen
description: Make fullscreen WhatsApp Web. Expand the area of chat in WhatsApp Web for big screens. When you open WhatsApp Web in a big screen the chat area is kind of small so I decided to expand that area. Screenshots: Before After Chrome Extension: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fullscreen-whatsapp-web/igdbejmefbphijhiinkfhhpaeamfnpmf?utm_source=chrome-ntp-icon
